title: Invisible Threat Gaming is looking for a team and staff
body:
About Invisible Threat Gaming

Invisible Threat Gaming is a leading organization in eSports with semi-pro teams in the most popular games such as League of Legends, Dota 2, Counter-Strike, and more. Our players represent our brand in every corner of the world. We have more than 1.000 followers on social media who follow us for the latest news on our players and live updates from events.
Over the years, our players have achieved incredible success and won numerous tournaments across multiple games.

The Invisible Threat Gaming organization was founded by both Konstantinos Stasinos and Lefteris Kokiantonis. Invisible Threat Gaming HQ is located in Athens, Greece. While staying true to our roots, Invisible Threat Gaming will continue to breed the best talents, select the finest partners, and continue to exceed expectations.

________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

We are currently looking for a team that will represent our organization at the Oceanian competitive scene. The organization has set some high requirements. Also, we are looking for staff members such as Coaches/Analysts and a Manager.

Requirements(teams):
-The team members must be together for min 2 months
-The average elo of the team must be at least high master+
-The team members must be: passionate, enthusiastic, responsible and goal driven
-18+ years old

Benefits being with us:
-TeamSpeak 3 server to communicate
-Potential Apparel and goodies from sponsors
-1000+ Fanbase to follow your team
-Prospects for a salary if you qualify to the OCS
-We will pay the tournament fees after an impressive performance of the team

You think that your team is the right option for us?

Apply now here: theo.matrapilias@invisiblethreat.net with the achievements of the team so far, the goals of the team, the LoLking accounts of the players and links of streams if you're streaming. 

________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

As a League of Legends Manager/Head Coach/Analyst you need to help with:

-Create a Training Schedule that is suitable for all players
-Monitor the overall health and condition of all players
-Ensure friendly atmosphere
-Leading the team during team training and warm ups
-Deliver performance results
-Providing feedback to players and staff on a weekly basis

Requirements (manager/coaches/analysts):
-Fluent in English
-Must be at least 18 years old
-A valid Oceania account is required
-Ability to format information in a clear and easy-to-understand way
-Good understanding of numbers and spreadsheet formulas
-Excellent verbal and written communication skills
-Education and Relevant Job Experience
-Excellent knowledge of League of Legends and its Oceanian competitive scene
-Ability to work to strict deadlines and complete jobs quickly and potentially at short notice

Each application will be required to submit to the following:

-A Curriculum vitae is needed
-Will be required to submit examples of previous work, even if it's not LoL related
-A basic understanding of the game is required, however, more knowledge is appreciated 
-LoLking URL

You think that you are the right option for us?

Apply now here: theo.matrapilias@invisiblethreat.net with the achievements of the team so far, the goals of the team, the LoLking accounts of the players and links of streams if you're streaming. 

________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
